mapper.insert: merge into cart_tbl c using dual on (mem_id = #{mem_id} and pdt_num = #{pdt_num}) when MATCHED then update set cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount} when not matched then insert(cart_code, pdt_num, mem_id, cart_amount) values(seq_cart_code.nextval, #{pdt_num}, #{mem_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.select: select c.cart_code, p.pdt_img, p.pdt_name, c.cart_amount, p.pdt_price from product_tbl p inner join cart_tbl c on p.pdt_num = c.pdt_num where c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
select p.pdt_name, sum(p.pdt_price * c.cart_amount) amount from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pdt_num = p.pdt_num group by p.pdt_name order by p.pdt_name
